url.description: Path URL of the external location.

credential_name.description: Name of the storage credential used with this location.

read_only.description: Indicates whether the external location is read-only.

owner.description: The owner of the external location.

access_point.description: The AWS access point to use when accesing s3 for this external location.

isolation_mode.description: New name for the external location.

new_name.description: Force update even if changing url invalidates dependent external tables or mounts.

force.description: Skips validation of the storage credential associated with the external location.

200.description: The external location was successfully updated.

patch.description: Updates an external location in the metastore. The caller must be the owner of the external location, or be a metastore admin. In the second case, the admin can only update the name of the external location.
